casebody.data:
Friday, November 12, 1999

MOTION DOCKET

98-2531. Natl. City Bank v. Beyer.

Huron App. No. H-98-006. This cause is pending before the court as an appeal and cross-appeal from the Court of Appeals for Huron County. Upon consideration of the motion of appellees/crossappellants Sophie Beyer et al. to extend time for oral argument to thirty minutes,

IT IS ORDERED by the court that the motion to extend time for oral argument be, and hereby is, denied.
